data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The "Algorithms" namespace seemed appropriate because network sorts
    can be developed in different ways (as shown by the algorithm
    choices in the nw_comparators() function). In addition, this is is
    also a module to be studied for the different implementations of
    network sort generators.

    As for the module itself, it seems to be unique, and covers a
    subject that gets discussed on various web sites. Its output is
    useful for insertion in other programs, or it can be used to
    illustrate the results of different algorithms.
